summary:
**Meeting Overview**:  
The Trinity River Corridor Local Government Corporation is holding a special called board meeting on May 31, 2024, from 10 a.m. to 11:30 a.m. at Dallas City Hall and via videoconference. The meeting aims to discuss key operational and financial updates related to the Trinity River Corridor project.

**Key Agenda Items**:  
1. Call to Order by Chair Vincent T. Parker.
2. Public speakers will be invited to share their comments.
3. Approval of the minutes from the January 19, 2024 meeting.
4. Review and approval of the 2023 Trinity River Corridor LGC Annual Report.
5. Presentation of the 2023 Financial Report by the Trinity Park Conservancy.
6. A preliminary report to the Transportation Committee by Tony Moore, CEO of the Trinity Park Conservancy.
7. Updates from various LGC work groups focusing on park operations, community engagement, park design advocacy, and communications.

**Important Details**:  
The meeting will include significant discussions on the annual report and financial status, which are crucial for ongoing and future projects within the corridor. The work group reports will provide insights into operational excellence and community involvement strategies.

**Action Items**:  
The board will seek approval for the minutes and the annual report, and will review the financial report. Decisions regarding the direction of work groups and their initiatives will also be addressed, along with any necessary actions stemming from public input.
